name: Hand Glides
description: Master smooth and continuous hand gliding techniques for liquid dance illusions.

cards.title: Basic Hand Glide
cards.description: A foundational movement that creates the illusion of hands sliding through air.
bulletpoints: Keep fingers slightly curved for a natural effect
Move hands in a continuous circular motion
Maintain even speed to enhance illusion

cards.title: Interweaving Hand Glide
cards.description: A more complex hand glide technique incorporating figure-eight movements.
bulletpoints: Alternate hands for a seamless effect
Use elbow movement to enhance fluidity
Slow down transitions for better control
